Structs/NDT7Settings.html#/s:4NDT70A8Set.name: wss
Structs/NDT7Settings.html#/s:4NDT70A8Set.abstract: Define if it is wss or ws.

Structs/NDT7Settings.html#/s:4NDT70A8Set.name: timeoutTest
Structs/NDT7Settings.html#/s:4NDT70A8Set.abstract: Define the max among of time used for a test before to force to finish.

Structs/NDT7Settings.html#/s:4NDT70A8Set.name: headers
Structs/NDT7Settings.html#/s:4NDT70A8Set.abstract: Define all the headers needed for NDT7 request.

Structs/NDT7BBRInfo.html#/s:4NDT70A7BBRI.name: bandwith
Structs/NDT7BBRInfo.html#/s:4NDT70A7BBRI.abstract: bandwith (a int64) is the max-bandwidth measured by BBR, in bits per second.

Structs/NDT7BBRInfo.html#/s:4NDT70A7BBRI.name: minRtt
Structs/NDT7BBRInfo.html#/s:4NDT70A7BBRI.abstract: minRtt (a float64) is the min-rtt measured by BBR, in millisecond;

Structs/NDT7BBRInfo.html#/s:4NDT70A7BBRI.name: description
Structs/NDT7BBRInfo.html#/s:4NDT70A7BBRI.abstract: description contains a formated string for NDT7BBRInfo.

Structs/NDT7APPInfo.html#/s:4NDT70A7APPI.name: numBytes
Structs/NDT7APPInfo.html#/s:4NDT70A7APPI.abstract: numBytes (a int64) is the number of bytes sent (or received) since the beginning of the specific subtest.

Structs/NDT7APPInfo.html#/s:4NDT70A7APPI.name: description
Structs/NDT7APPInfo.html#/s:4NDT70A7APPI.abstract: description contains a formated string for NDT7APPInfo.

Structs/NDT7TCPInfo.html#/s:4NDT70A7TCPI.name: smoothedRtt
Structs/NDT7TCPInfo.html#/s:4NDT70A7TCPI.abstract: smoothedRtt (a float64) is the smoothed RTT in milliseconds.

Structs/NDT7TCPInfo.html#/s:4NDT70A7TCPI.name: rttVar
Structs/NDT7TCPInfo.html#/s:4NDT70A7TCPI.abstract: rttVar (a float64) is RTT variance in milliseconds;

Structs/NDT7TCPInfo.html#/s:4NDT70A7TCPI.name: description
Structs/NDT7TCPInfo.html#/s:4NDT70A7TCPI.abstract: description contains a formated string for NDT7TCPInfo.

Structs/NDT7Measurement.html#/s:4NDT70A1.name: elapsed
Structs/NDT7Measurement.html#/s:4NDT70A1.abstract: elapsed (a float64) is the number of seconds elapsed since the beginning of the specific subtest and marks

Structs/NDT7Measurement.html#/s:4NDT70A1.name: tcpInfo
Structs/NDT7Measurement.html#/s:4NDT70A1.abstract: tcpInfo is an optional object only included in the measurement when it is possible to access TCP_INFO stats.

Structs/NDT7Measurement.html#/s:4NDT70A1.name: appInfo
Structs/NDT7Measurement.html#/s:4NDT70A1.abstract: appInfo is an optional object only included in the measurement when an application-level measurement is available.

Structs/NDT7Measurement.html#/s:4NDT70A1.name: bbrInfo
Structs/NDT7Measurement.html#/s:4NDT70A1.abstract: bbrInfo is an optional object only included in the measurement when it is possible to access TCP_CC_INFO stats for BBR.

Structs/NDT7Measurement.html#/s:4NDT70A1.name: description
Structs/NDT7Measurement.html#/s:4NDT70A1.abstract: description contains a formated string for NDT7Measurement.

Structs/NDT7Measurement.html.name: NDT7Measurement
Structs/NDT7Measurement.html.abstract: For measurement, the server and client exchange JSON measurements using Textual WebSocket messages.

Structs/NDT7TCPInfo.html.name: NDT7TCPInfo
Structs/NDT7TCPInfo.html.abstract: NDT7TCPInfo is an optional object only included in the measurement when it is possible to access TCP_INFO stats.

Structs/NDT7APPInfo.html.name: NDT7APPInfo
Structs/NDT7APPInfo.html.abstract: NDT7APPInfo is an optional object only included in the measurement when an application-level measurement is available.

Structs/NDT7BBRInfo.html.name: NDT7BBRInfo
Structs/NDT7BBRInfo.html.abstract: NDT7BBRInfo is an optional object only included in the measurement when it is possible to access TCP_CC_INFO stats for BBR.

Protocols/NDT7TestInteraction.html#/s:4N.name: downloadTestError(_:)
Protocols/NDT7TestInteraction.html#/s:4N.abstract: Error returned if something happen during a download test.

Protocols/NDT7TestInteraction.html#/s:4N.name: uploadTestError(_:)
Protocols/NDT7TestInteraction.html#/s:4N.abstract: Error returned if something happen during an upload test.

Protocols/NDT7TestInteraction.html.name: NDT7TestInteraction
Protocols/NDT7TestInteraction.html.abstract: This protocol allows to receive the test information.

Classes/NDT7Test.html#/s:4NDT70A4TestC8d.name: delegate
Classes/NDT7Test.html#/s:4NDT70A4TestC8d.abstract: This delegate allows to return the test interaction information (NDT7TestInteraction protocol).

Classes/NDT7Test.html#/s:4NDT70A4TestC8s.name: settings
Classes/NDT7Test.html#/s:4NDT70A4TestC8s.abstract: This parameter contains all the settings needed for ndt7 test.

Classes/NDT7Test.html#/s:4NDT70A4TestC05.name: startTest(download:upload:_:)
Classes/NDT7Test.html#/s:4NDT70A4TestC05.abstract: Start a test for download and/or upload, returning error if something was wrong.

Classes/NDT7.html#/s:4NDT7AAC14loggingEn.name: loggingEnabled
Classes/NDT7.html#/s:4NDT7AAC14loggingEn.abstract: This parameter allows to enable loggins and check the log messages

Classes/NDT7.html.name: NDT7
Classes/NDT7.html.abstract: NDT7 provides a framework to measure the download and upload speed.

Classes/NDT7Test.html.name: NDT7Test
Classes/NDT7Test.html.abstract: NDT7Test describes the version 7 of the Network Diagnostic Tool (NDT) protocol (ndt7).
